title: LBJ Memorial Grove on the Potomac: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Entrance Fee There is no entrance fee at the Lyndon Baines Johnson Memorial Grove on the Potomac. Picnic tables and parking are available on a first come, first served basis. Fees for Activities Most ranger-led programs at the park are free. Marinas Please contact the Columbia Island Marina (202-347-0173) for boat rental, launch, or storage fees. Permits Permits are required for certain activities within the park such as:  Commercial vehicles Weddings Any activity in which participants are paying to participate, such as tours or classes Religious services and ceremonies Funeral and memorial ceremonies Filming in the park Non-Vehicular Commercial Use of the Park  Additional Information
